title: A Perfect Spot
description: In this Dateline classic, a romantic Valentine’s Day evening at the park turns into a horrifying crime scene for married couple, Stacey and Richard Schoeck. Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on April 9, 2015.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
